title: Platformer Adventure Music Pack
description: Platformer Adventure is a music pack for games that feature multiple unique settings, from medieval villages, tropical islands, industrial dystopias, and more!
longDescription:
This music pack contains 15 loops total, fit for a wide variety of environments that may appear in an adventure-platformer style game. Inside this pack awaits musical themes for industrial dystopias, medieval villages, tropical islands, snowy wonderlands, tribal jungles, and more! And while plenty is being covered here, most songs share a similar instrumental pallet to keep things feeling unified. Presented in high-quality 16-bit WAV format.


Previews available HERE
